caption:
🧠 How Psychedelics Unlock Neuroplasticity 🌱

Robin Carhart-Harris @robincarhartharris breaks down how high-dose psychedelics “scramble” the self, dissolving old beliefs and opening a window of plasticity—a rare opportunity for deep transformation. 🌊 Imagine tilling the soil of your mind, clearing away weeds so you can plant new, intentional growth. 🌿

What would you rewire in your life if given this chance? ✨ Join the convo ⬇️ 

#Neuroplasticity #PsychedelicHealing #MindsetShift #EastForest #MusicForMushrooms #RobinCarhartHarris
